title: Router: Service Features (DB/Auth/Cache/Docs)
description: Routes common service feature requests to the correct pack.

content.mermaid:
flowchart TD
  Input[add feature] --> Pick{which?}
  Pick -->|database| DB[pack.feature.database.v1]
  Pick -->|auth| Auth[pack.feature.auth.v1]
  Pick -->|cache| Cache[pack.feature.cache.v1]
  Pick -->|api docs| Docs[pack.feature.api_docs.v1]
  Pick -->|other| Fallback[graph.router.feature_by_shape.v1]
